name: Social Distancing (Cable Stayed Studios)
description:
You're at the grocery store surrounded by 25 other people of unknown contagion. The shelves are empty except for some fruit... actually the fruit is pretty well stocked, but everything else is gone! Why am i here going to random spots with no food? BECAUSE THIS GAME FEATURES AN ONLINE LEADERBOARD and getting to those spots grants you points and e-clout. 

This project is an extention on my submission to ScoreSpace Jam #8. I jumped into that game jam a day late, so I wanted to see what the game would be like with an extra day of work.

Made by Cable Stayed Studios, creating games to save the world.

Follow me on Twitter @ZacharyBuffone to get updates on current and future projects like this one.
